This game is the most BS thing and unbalanced shit ever, i swear they nerfed thing like insta heals cause it was 'too op', but you know what they dont nerf? MORIS! NOED! Instadown perks and items that basically just give the Killer a GG even before the game starts, the devs only think about the high ranks, the middle ranks dont matter at all, im sick of seeing Ruin, Noed, basically everysingle game, most of the time the killer only downs me once and guess why, exacly, noed, then my team mates procede to leave, thing that i dont judge at all, i know its still a totem but with end game pressure its almost impossible to find it, i had a lot of dun in the begining but now i cant play more than just 1 match like per week.

民度低くて、運営はクソで、バグも多いけど、面白いゲーム

Gioco molto divertente in pre-made, molto noioso a parer mio se giocato da solo dal lato sopravvissuto!
Dal lato killer ci sono evidenti momenti nel quale vorresti disintallare il gioco! come il body-block al gancio, trolling ecc...
Da entrambi i ruoli si possono riscontrare una mareaaaaa di bug e molti errori!
Dopo ciò ammetto che nel contesto il gioco non è male da giocare con amici! (se non fosse per i toxi.vdsn)
Per me vale un 8/10 ;)

Игра классная, но очень долгий поиск.

I would love to recommend this game but I can't. Which is odd because I have had a lot of fun and have spent a lot of time playing this game. It has endless charm and even though it's an extremely repetitive gameplay loop I always come back.

I can't recommend it because of things that exist in DBD game like the Mori, an offering that you can bring into a game that allows the killer to take a (or more) survivor out of the game essentially twice as fast. This game has a very delicate balance to it just like alot of asymmetrical games. DBD especially in the timing and pacing of a match. gens go too fast; killer doesn't have a chance or much fun. too slow; survivors don't stand a chance and get mowed over. yada yada you get it. 

With balance being so delicate in their game I cannot wrap my mind around why they have left in something like the Mori. All you would have to do to fix the mori is make it so you cant use it until the survivors are on their last hook, Just let it be for show,. Hell, monitize the Mori but letting buy different variations, that ones free on me behavior.. Im not trying to complain on behalf of survivors, there are plenty of these issues for both sides. Mori's just perfectly captivate the mentality Behavior takes with this game and where they put their priorities. and no, I dont expect it to be perfectly balanced for esports compititions. DBD is much better as a casual game to play on the side with friends... BUT, when I can get unhooked in a bad spot and taken out of the game in the 1st 60 seconds to a mori; i dont feel very good about playing this game.
剛開始低段位會排比較久一點，過渡期而已，之後就還好，希望是可以再增加一些模式，以增加遊戲耐玩度，例如2對8多人模式之類的。

So if you're reading reviews, I'm confident that  you're familiar with the concept.  I'll get to what I like and dislike about this game.  
Pros
1.  Great atmosphere, at times can be very startling especially against a good killer
2.  Gameplay is fairly solid, few bugs to speak of
3.  The dev team is constantly adding new killers and survivors as well as skins and maps with ways to earn almost everything in game.
4.  Feeling accomplished when you kill all four survivors or escape that really difficult match

Cons
1.  Playerbase is at times, very toxic.  Very little forgiveness if you mess up as a survivor and expect to be called trash if you aren't polished as a killer.
2.  The same playerbase expects everyone to adhere to certain rules (no tunneling, no prolonged looping, etc...) which to me, is ridiculous.  I paid for the game, I should be able to play as I see fit in any situation.
3.  There is a learning curve as to how to mix and match perks, do your homework before you settle on a set, what sounds good may not work well with the others you've picked.  
4.  Lastly, there is no communication except for a limited number of emotes in game unless you use discord or something similar.  That said, it would totally undermine the killer if the survivors were able to talk so don't hold out for implementation.
Un juego excelente para los amantes del terror.  Está lleno de guiños a las películas slasher clásicas.

This game used to be a great experience and tons of fun. Now all you get is toxic af killers that need crutches to succeed or toxic survivors that are rank 1-8 when you are rank 18... Mind you I am a killer main. That only plays survivor with 3 of my friends. Here's a hint, noed + camping + tunneling = No fun  for survivors and  no fun in killing those survivors. I petition to remove noed and any of the other BS perks.
